alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Multnomah (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 10 at 11:24PM PDT until June 11 at 12:20PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Johnson Creek at Sycamore affecting Clackamas and Multnomah Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Johnson Creek at Sycamore. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 11.0 feet, minor flooding begins along Johnson Creek between SE 92nd Street to SE 122nd Street and between Johnson Creek and SE Harold Street. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To escape rising water, take the shortest path to higher ground. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
